name: For Whom The Diving Bell Tolls
name_original: For Whom The Diving Bell Tolls
description:
Venture into the deep ocean to find your grandfather’s most precious belonging, in order to revitalize your aging grandmother’s memory and learn about your grandfather’s past. Bringing your grandfather’s trusty harpoon and diving bell, are you ready to face what lurks in the deep?

Move: A or Left Arrow Key for Left, D or Right Arrow for Right

Jump: Space

Shoot Harpoon: Left Mouse Click
